verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:9
verses.text: Neither was the man created for the woman; but the woman for the man.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:10
verses.text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:11
verses.text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman, neither the woman without the man, in the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:12
verses.text: For as the woman is of the man, even so is the man also by the woman; but all things of God.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 11:13
verses.text: Judge in yourselves: is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered?
